invocations.description: Shows higher window of all windows that fit the description of locationname. If locationname is not specified, all windows are shown their higher window. If onlyone is specified as true, then the higher container is shown only once for one window.
invocations.ex:
local firstBp = getcontainer(0)
while firstBp.hashigher do
	higherwindows('0')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will show the highest window of your first opened backpack.
